description: Makes HTTP requests (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, etc.) to a specified URL with optional headers, query parameters, and body.

inputs.name: url
inputs.description: The URL to send the request to.

inputs.name: headers
inputs.description: Optional HTTP headers as key-value pairs.

inputs.name: query
inputs.description: Optional query parameters as key-value pairs.

inputs.name: body
inputs.description: Optional request body (for POST, PUT, PATCH, etc.).

outputs.name: status
outputs.description: The HTTP status code returned by the server.

outputs.name: headers
outputs.description: The response headers as key-value pairs.

outputs.name: body
outputs.description: The response body, parsed as JSON if possible, otherwise as text.

outputs.name: error
outputs.description: Error message if the request failed.
